questions.question: In your opinion why all the customer requirements could not be satisfied?

answers.b: Lack of understanding of the requirements

questions.question: Is the dynamic simulation of the process matches with the fullest extent of customer requirements?
Which component of the plant will consume maximum energy?
Which method will be useful for reducing the energy consumption of the calibration facility?

answers.a: By reducing the number of cycles of the experiments
answers.b: By maximizing the number of  sensors to be calibrated simultaneously
answers.c: By re-designing the entire calibration facility
